knowledge: Lumbar Puncture Lumbar Puncture  Common side effects include back pain, discomfort, and headache.  Mild pain and discomfort are common, but severe pain is not. dialog: Hi Medi, what is meningitis and how can I get it?
Hello! Meningitis is an inflammation of the meninges, the membranes that surround the brain and spinal cord. You can get it through contact with an infected person's body fluids.
Can anyone get meningitis?
Yes, but individuals with weak immune systems, such as young children, older adults, and those with certain medical conditions, are more susceptible to meningitis.
What are the symptoms of meningitis?
Symptoms of meningitis include fever, headache, stiff neck, and sensitivity to light. You may also experience nausea, vomiting, confusion, and a rash.
How can I prevent meningitis?

Practicing good hygiene, such as washing your hands regularly, covering your mouth when coughing or sneezing, and avoiding close contact with sick people, can help prevent the spread of meningitis. Vaccination is also important.
